text: another adventure is about to begin I am
heading off for the next month to
Pakistan Afghanistan and Iraq
[Music]
it's a trip that I'm really looking
forward to these three countries are
some of the most
off-the-beaten-path and difficult ones
to enter and I finally got all my visas
secured and I'm super excited to go
check them out I just want to say right
off the bat that a lot of people have
been giving me a lot of hatred and hate
mail towards especially Pakistan not to
call on my Indian friends but I've
gotten a lot of messages specifically
from Indian people warning me about
Pakistan saying do not go because it's a
terrorist country or telling me that I'm
gonna die and this is absolute nonsense
so specifically for you guys I can't
wait to see reaction when you watch
these Pakistan videos and you realize
that their culture is pretty much the
same as yours or your next-door
neighbor's so that's really what I'm
most looking forward to is shattering
these stereotypes between these two
countries and just showing you that
you're all the same
Afghanistan and Iraq are two countries
that specifically Americans they would
be very intimidated to go to and I've
also had a lot of hate mail towards
going to these countries but once again
I can't wait to go there and break the
stereotypes go off the beaten path into
faraway villages connect with the people
eat the food home-cooked meals
experience a culture and especially the
hospitality because the Arabic countries
are some of my favorite in the world I
absolutely loved that part of the world
it's just going to be a really special
experience to be able to document
everything with my camera as far as
safety goes I will always be with local
friends local contacts and to operators
and most of the people I met through
social media which is awesome in this
day and age stay tuned on my facebook on

daily videos I might even make two

going to be that vibrant so once again
thanks for joining me on this adventure
and I will see you guys next from
Pakistan
I'm drew Minsky and if you like my
